title: Mr. Funny
description: Mr Funny lives in a teapot and drives a car that looks like a shoe. He likes nothing better than making other people laugh.They're back! Rediscover the zaniest characters you've ever met in this best-selling series which has sold millions worldwide. Bright and charming, with easily recognizable characters and a small take-along format, Mr. Men and Little Miss books are easy enough for young readers, witty enough for humor-prone adults, and highly collectible for one and all.
author: Roger Hargreaves
